H0.text: What is the name of the iron hook which is attached to the pole used by fisherman to land a heavy fish. **Snare**

H1.text: What is the name of the iron hook which is attached to the pole used by fisherman to land a heavy fish. **Cleat**

H2.text: What is the name of the iron hook which is attached to the pole used by fisherman to land a heavy fish. **Grapple**

H3.text: What is the name of the iron hook which is attached to the pole used by fisherman to land a heavy fish. Gaff

A4.text: a gaff is a handheld pole with a sharp hook or sideway spike on the distal end
